itemDescription: British educator, college head and promoter of physical education for girls (1860–1951)

wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Stansfeld  (10 March 1860 – 28 June 1951) was a British teacher and educator who was the founder and Principal of the Bedford Physical Training College from 1903 to 1945 and promoted physical education for girls.

response: * Margaret Stansfeld, President of the Association of Principals of Women's Physical Training Colleges.
* Margaret Stansfeld (1860–1951), English educator, and founder and Principal (1903) of the Bedford Physical Training College
